scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.postversion: cross-env npm_config_yes=true npx json -I -f backend/package.json -e "this.version = process.env.npm_package_version" && cross-env npm_config_yes=true npx json -I -f frontend/package.json -e "this.version = process.env.npm_package_version"
